entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
